item.title: [Development] ul.dl, the no-bullshit file hosting service
item.description: ul.dl, the no-bullshit file hosting service You might have heard of 0x0, the no-bullshit file hosting service. It is a service for quickly sharing files right from your command line without having to point or click anywhere. What you do is, you send a POST request to the site with the file and the site will respond with a url that has the raw content of that file. For example,
